short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Customize Roblox the way you want it.
short.de: Passen Sie Roblox so an, wie Sie es wollen.
short.fr: Personnalisez Roblox comme vous le souhaitez.
short.id: Sesuaikan Roblox seperti yang Anda inginkan.
short.pt_BR: Personalize Roblox da forma que desejar.
short.ru: Настройте Roblox так, как вам нужно.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Roblokis is extension to enable or disable custom features
and design your own custom theme for roblox website.

please contact me for any in-consistencies rather than rating the extension 1 star and stating the problem in the rating.

Roblokis has;
- the best roblox site designer
- better servers, badges, menu, icons, colors, game cards, avatar designs and more
- create custom personalized themes using a theme editor
- quick game join buttons on home page, joining a game is literally a click away
- small servers section for easy access to servers with few players
- set game's banner as a page background to make every game page feel unique
- organize side menu however you want, or remove the buttons and create your own
and more features.

it partially supports BTRoblox, RoPro, RoGold, Roblox+ and Roseal.

Roblokis will Never Gonna Give You Up,
and Never Gonna Let You Down...
long.de,es,fr,id,pt_BR,ru,tr:
Roblokis is extension to enable or disable custom features
and design your own custom theme for roblox website.

if you think its a cookie logger then please check
https://ameerdotexe.github.io/roblokis/privacy/

you should get Roblokis because it has some very helpful features
such as;
- better servers & badge design
- small servers section
- profile status are back
- faster friend removing
and more features including custom theme.

it supports BTRoblox, RoPro, RoGold and Roblox+

Roblokis will Never Gonna Give You Up,
and Never Gonna Let You Down...
